text: Jones and the Lady Book Agent is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithJONES AND THE LADY BOOK AGENTJones and the Lady Book Agent and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Flora Finch. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Mr. Jones * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Jones * Flora Finch as lady book agent * Mack Sennett as Dick Smith * Gertrude Robinson as maid * Owen Moore in office * Harry Solter in office * George Gebhardt in office * Robert Harron as messenger ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Jones and the Lady Book Agent
